home.description: Discover quality used cars at unbeatable prices. Quebecar, transparency and personalized service for your trust.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2024, QuebeCar was born from a passion for automobiles and a desire to revolutionize the car market in Quebec. We started as a small local dealership and have grown to become a major player in the sale of new and used cars.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At QuebeCar, we are committed to providing quality vehicles, whether new or used, at competitive prices. Our goal is to make buying a car as simple and enjoyable as possible for all Quebecers.

values.title: Our Values
values.quality: Quality and reliability of our vehicles

newCars.title: New Car Sales
newCars.content: Discover our wide range of new vehicles from the best brands.

usedCars.title: Certified Used Cars
usedCars.content: Carefully inspected and guaranteed used vehicles.

financing.title: Flexible Financing
financing.content: Financing options tailored to all budgets.

afterSales.title: After-Sales Service
afterSales.content: A team of qualified mechanics for the maintenance of your vehicle.

cta.title: Ready to find your next car?
cta.content: Visit our showroom or contact us for a personalized consultation.
